scripts.deploy:hardhat: rm -rf artifacts && hardhat --network hardhat deploy --tags hardhat
scripts.deploy:kovan: rm -rf artifacts && hardhat --network kovan deploy --tags kovan
scripts.deploy:mainnet: rm -rf artifacts && hardhat --network mainnet deploy --tags mainnet
scripts.deploy:avalanche: rm -rf artifacts && hardhat --network avalanche deploy --tags avalanche
scripts.deploy:polygon: rm -rf artifacts && hardhat --network polygon deploy --tags polygon
scripts.deploy:fantom: rm -rf artifacts && hardhat --network fantom deploy --tags fantom
scripts.deploy:bsc: rm -rf artifacts && hardhat --network bsc deploy --tags bsc
scripts.deploy:xdai: rm -rf artifacts && hardhat --network xdai deploy --tags xdai
scripts.deploy:arbitrum: rm -rf artifacts && hardhat --network arbitrum deploy --tags arbitrum
scripts.deploy:optimism: rm -rf artifacts && hardhat --network optimism deploy --tags optimism
scripts.deploy:rinkeby: rm -rf artifacts && hardhat --network rinkeby deploy --tags rinkeby
scripts.verify:kovan: rm -rf artifacts && hardhat compile && hardhat --network kovan etherscan-verify --license None --force-license
scripts.verify:mainnet: rm -rf artifacts && hardhat compile && hardhat --network mainnet etherscan-verify --license None --force-license
scripts.verify:avalanche: rm -rf artifacts && hardhat compile && hardhat --network avalanche etherscan-verify --license None --force-license
scripts.verify:polygon: rm -rf artifacts && hardhat compile && hardhat --network polygon etherscan-verify --license None --force-license
scripts.verify:fantom: rm -rf artifacts && hardhat compile && hardhat --network fantom etherscan-verify --license None --force-license
scripts.verify:bsc: rm -rf artifacts && hardhat compile && hardhat --network bsc etherscan-verify --license None --force-license
scripts.verify:arbitrum: rm -rf artifacts && hardhat compile && hardhat --network arbitrum etherscan-verify --license None --force-license
scripts.verify:optimism: rm -rf artifacts && hardhat compile && hardhat --network optimism etherscan-verify --license None --force-license
scripts.verify:rinkeby: rm -rf artifacts && hardhat compile && hardhat --network rinkeby etherscan-verify --license None --force-license
scripts.coverage: rm -rf artifacts && rm -rf test/types && hardhat compile --config hardhat.test.config.ts && hardhat coverage --config hardhat.test.config.ts
scripts.coverage:fast: rm -rf artifacts && rm -rf test/types && hardhat compile --config hardhat.test.config.ts && hardhat coverage --config hardhat.fast-test.config.ts
scripts.prettier: ./node_modules/.bin/prettier -w contracts/**/*.sol test/*.test.ts test/*.spec.ts test/library/*.ts test/integration/*.ts test/behaviors/*.ts tasks/*.ts
scripts.lstrategy-slippage: rm -rf artifacts && hardhat compile && hardhat --config hardhat.test.config.ts lstrategy-slippage --tickchange 100 --erc20ratio 5 --percentagechange 90
scripts.lstrategy-backtest: rm -rf artifacts && hardhat compile && hardhat --config hardhat.backtest.config.ts lstrategy-backtest --filename price_data.csv --width 60 --weth 10 --wsteth 10
